```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
library(sf)
library(maps)
library(mapdata)

#import california map
state <- map_data("state")
ca <- subset(state, region=="california")

#import sanel study site
sv <- st_read("data_covariates/study_site/SanelValley_studysite.shp", crs = st_crs(4326)) 


ca_map <- ggplot() + 
  geom_polygon(data=ca, mapping=aes(x=long, y=lat), color="black", fill=NA) + 
  geom_sf(data=sv, fill=NA, color="red") + 
  theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(), axis.text.x=element_blank(), axis.ticks.x=element_blank(),
        axis.title.y=element_blank(), axis.text.y=element_blank(), axis.ticks.y=element_blank()) + 
  theme_void()
ca_map
```

```{r}
#Load KUD
load(file = "kud_coyote.Rdata")
#set as sf object
hr <- st_as_sf(kud_contour) %>% 
  filter(id!="C6") 

#package for scale bar
library(ggsn)
library(ggspatial) #package for base layer

hopland_map <- ggplot() +
  #geom_sf(data=hr, fill = NA, color = factor(hr$id)) +
  #annotation_map_tile("stamenbw") +
  geom_sf(data=hr, fill = NA, color = factor(hr$id)) +
  geom_sf(data=sv, fill=NA, color="gray") + 
  theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(), 
        axis.text.x=element_blank(), 
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank(),
        axis.title.y=element_blank(), 
        axis.text.y=element_blank(), 
        axis.ticks.y=element_blank()) + 
  theme_void() + 
  scalebar(hr, location = "bottomleft", dist = 2.5, dist_unit = "km", height = 0.02, 
           st.dist = 0.02, st.bottom = TRUE, st.size = 2.5,
             transform = FALSE, model = "WGS84") + 
  north(hr, location = "topright", symbol = 15)

hopland_map
```

```{r}
library(cowplot)
## draw insets
p1 <- ggdraw() +
  draw_plot(hopland_map, x = 0.35, width = 0.5, height = 0.9) +
  draw_plot(ca_map, x = 0.05, y = 0.35, width = 0.3, height = 0.5)


```
